sentences.en: A plant that grows more than three feet about a meter is unusual on the tundra.
sentences.cn: 一种植物若能长得超过了三英尺,这在冻土带上就是很不平常的了.

sentences.en: Coastal tundra of the northern boreal climate.
sentences.cn: 北部沿海地区属寒带苔原气候.

sentences.en: Everything, pretty much, tastes like the mosses of tundra, dug up in mid - winter.
sentences.cn: 这些东西, 有相当多一部分, 尝起来就像深冬季节挖出的冻土带的地衣.

sentences.en: Frozen dog dirt stipples the tundra of the golf course.
sentences.cn: 冻成冰块的狗屎点缀着高尔夫球场的苔原。

sentences.en: Gley soils are typical of tundra , meadows, and boggy areas.
sentences.cn: 该种土壤是苔原 、 草地以及沼地所特有的.

sentences.en: How will the lifecydes of the tundra be affected?
sentences.cn: 冻土带的生命循环将受到怎样的影响 呢 ?

sentences.en: North American subspecies of tundra swan having a soft whistling note.
sentences.cn: 冻原天鹅的北美洲亚种,以其柔和的鸣叫著名.

sentences.en: Overcome treacherous obstacles of the frozen tundra. bursting geysers , raging snowballs and exploding avalanches.
sentences.cn: 穿过冰原上的各种危险的障碍:突发的冰泉 、 来势汹汹的雪球以及大雪崩.

sentences.en: The arctic tundra is at the top of the world around the North Pole.
sentences.cn: 北极冻原是指北极点周边的地区,是世界最高的地方.

sentences.en: The Aurora Borealis as seen from the sub - arctic tundra nightscape . Wapusk National Park , Manitoba , Canada.
sentences.cn: 这是出现在亚北极区冻土带夜幕中的北极光.

sentences.en: The park contains 150 lakes and 450 miles of streams, plus ecosystems ranging from wetlands to pine forests to montane areas to alpine tundra.
sentences.cn: 这个国家公园包括150个湖泊和450英里河流以及从湿地到松林、从山丘到高山冻原等各种生态系统。

sentences.en: The San Antonio plant can produce 200,000 full - size Tundra pickup trucks a year.
sentences.cn: 圣安东尼奥工厂的Tundra年产能是20万辆.

sentences.en: The Tundra Times, a weekly newspaper in Alaska, ceased publication this week.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加的周报《苔原时报》本周停刊了。

sentences.en: There is a large amount of methane gas under the Siberian tundra.
sentences.cn: 西伯利亚的冻土地带之下有大量的甲烷气体.

sentences.en: These are Tundra Buggies, designed to bring people to polar bears.
sentences.cn: 这些是苔原车, 用于携带研究者接近北极熊.

sentences.en: They just chomp on tundra, nap a few hours and feast again.
sentences.cn: 它们只是在苔原上大嚼特嚼, 睡上几小时,接着再吃.

sentences.en: Wilderness forests give way to arctic tundra in the Far North.
sentences.cn: 原生森林一直延伸到极远的北方始由极地草原取代.

words.tran_cn: [生态]苔原；[地理]冻原；冻土地带

phrases.tran_cn: 北极冻原；北极苔原；藓苔湿原

trans.tran_cn: （多数位于北极圈的）冻土带，苔原，冻原，寒漠
trans.tran_en: the large flat areas of land in the north of Russia, Canada etc, where it is very cold and there are no trees
